## HospitalNetwork

A functional approach to building hospital networks from data on hospitalised patients who are transferred through and between hospitals.

Aims to provide a common framework to build and analyse these (static) networks.

Coauthors: Pascal Crepey, Tjibbe Donker.

Available on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=HospitalNetwork) and [GitHub](https://github.com/PascalCrepey/HospitalNetwork)

## condensr

An easy-to-use, fast framework for generating academic "group" websites. Fundamentally, it is a bunch of Quarto templates with some convenient wrappers.

Available on [GitHub](https://github.com/MikeLydeamore/condensr).

Used for:

* [SPECTRUM CRE](https://www.spectrum.edu.au/)
* [SPARK Capacity Building Center](https://www.spark.edu.au)

## conmat

Synthetic contact matrix generation based on contact diary surveys, and models of population-specific factors.

Coauthors: Nick Tierney, Nick Golding.

Available on [GitHub](https://github.com/MikeLydeamore/conmat).
